Description:
Pristine Living in Convenient Local
Located within walking distance to Arena Shopping Centre is this immaculate 4 bedroom home boasting all the modern conveniences you would desire.
The functional floor plan is made up of lounge and open plan, fully equipped kitchen, incorporating dining and family room. Features ducted heating, evaporative cooling, en suite to master, new carpets and direct entry to the double remote garage. Outdoors offers an inviting, alfresco area overlooking newly landscaped, low maintenance garden and manicure lawns. Conveniently located with minutes to the Monash Freeway, schooling, shops and public transport makes for convenient living.
Contact Amanda Charles 0400 347 968
Insights: 4 William Court, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
FAMILY FRIENDLY SANCTUARY
Thoughtfully designed and custom built, homes like this are simply made to withstand the test of time.
Flooded with an abundance of natural lighting, this large four bedroom residence is graced with a functional floorplan including three large separate living areas and ample storage.
The impressive kitchen overlooks the central living area and boasts large stone benchtops, large walk in pantry, quality 900mm appliances as well as soft close cupboards/pot drawers. Youll be impressed to find quality porcelain tiles, large laundry and the ensuite and main bathroom feature stone benchtops and dual vanities.
Each window overlooks the mature garden landscape which has been carefully designed and planted to achieve the most spectacular outcome. Youll be overjoyed to find your very own water features, veggie patch and fruit trees too!
This family home really does have it all air conditioning and evaporative cooling, ducted heating, NBN, solar panels and double glazing throughout, all whilst being centrally located on the north side of Officer within The Rise Estate which means you are close to an array of schools (including the new primary school under construction in Timbertop for 2021 start), shops, cafes, walking tracks and parks, freeway access, public transport and anything else you could possibly need.
All thats left to do is simply move straight in and enjoy.
Insights: 9 Burgess Avenue, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle Entertainer!
This prestige 31 square Carlisle built home has everything you need!
As you enter the home you quickly realise the quality fittings and luxurious appliances fitted throughout the house sitting on a 512m2 block (approx.) in a quiet court location, this home is a must to inspect.
The beautiful big kitchen is the highlight of the house including a butler's pantry, extended island bench with quality Caeserstone benchtops, smeg stainless steel appliances and double ovens. Overlooking the large meals family area.
The open plan living presents formal entry, to the lounge/theatre and living rooms, 3 generous size bedrooms including a spacious master with walk-in-robe and ensuite with double shower and his and hers vanities. Remaining bedrooms will accommodate queen size beds with a walking-in-robe. Plus, a bedroom size study.
This low maintenance property boasts well landscaped gardens, aggregate drive way and concrete paths, internal and external access from the extended double garage with rear roller door access to the backyard.
HIGHLIGHT FEATURES
- High ceilings
- Refrigerated cooling
- Ducted heating
- Bamboo timber flooring throughout
- LED downlights
- Double glazed windows
- Caeserstone benchtops
- Extended double car garage
- Landscaped gardens
- Timber deck to the backyard
- Hot solar water system
Be quick to act, as homes like this don't last long!
Insights: 10 Barrow Court, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIME BLOCK ON RIX ROAD
Reserve On Rix is more than just a home - it's a neighbourhood, a community and family.
Our neighbourhood comes with top class amenities for the locals. Reserve on Rix offers a boutique opportunity to live in an area that will fulfil all your family wishes. Officer has an exciting and vibrant hub of activity in its town centre with a buzzing town square, shops, restaurants, community centres and parklands. There are a range of Primary and Secondary Schools around Officer. Upgraded roads and freeways will link you to the city and surrounds, located approximately 40 minutes from Melbourne CBD. Public transport will get you to surrounding suburbs and centres, and into the city. Just under 1 hour commute to Public Transport to Melbourne CBD. The nearby Arena shopping centre allows you to live and shop local in Officer. The centre has a range of stores including Woolworths Supermarket, BWS Beer Wine Spirts and over 25 specialty stores. A low maintenance allotment, you wont know what to do with yourself but to sit back and enjoy your brand new home. 25 Premium Lots Available. Land sizes 205m2 to 375m2. Reserve on Rix offers for your exclusive purchase 25 boutique land lots. Its your time to reserve a piece of the reserve.

Description:
CHIC & CONTEMPORARY
Only one year old and superbly finished from inside out, this stylish three bedroom home caters for the low maintenance lifestyle you have been dreaming of. Perfectly positioned on the prestigious north side of Officer, within the Heritage Rise Estate, youll find yourself in an enviable location close to parks, walking tracks, schools, shops, freeway access and so much more.
Contemporarily designed, with a functional floorplan which makes for easy living, you will love the large open plan kitchen, meals and living zone which overlooks the spacious decked outdoor entertaining area with stacker sliding doors to combine indoor/outdoor living.
The spacious master bedroom features built in robes and ensuite, with the remaining generous two bedrooms serviced by a central family bathroom and additional powder room.
The home is upgraded throughout and boasts high ceilings, stylish floating floors, quality appliances including 900mm free standing oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops, ducted heating, air-conditioning, LED lighting, and even an oversized double garage with room for ample storage.
All of this on a 257m2 allotment, with no body corporate to worry about.
A home with so much to offer will not be around for long, be sure to inspect as soon as possible before it is gone.
Insights: 225 Pink Hill Boulevard, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:

Reserve On Rix is more than just a home - it's a neighbourhood, a community and family.
Our neighbourhood comes with top class amenities for the locals. Reserve on Rix offers a boutique opportunity to live in an area that will fulfil all your family wishes. Officer has an exciting and vibrant hub of activity in its town centre with a buzzing town square, shops, restaurants, community centres and parklands. There are a range of Primary and Secondary Schools around Officer. Upgraded roads and freeways will link you to the city and surrounds, located approximately 40 minutes from Melbourne CBD. Public transport will get you to surrounding suburbs and centres, and into the city. Just under 1 hour commute to Public Transport to Melbourne CBD. The nearby Arena shopping centre allows you to live and shop local in Officer. The centre has a range of stores including Woolworths Supermarket, BWS Beer Wine Spirts and over 25 specialty stores. A low maintenance allotment, you wont know what to do with yourself but to sit back and enjoy your brand new home. 25 Premium Lots Available. Land sizes 205m2 to 375m2. Reserve on Rix offers for your exclusive purchase 25 boutique land lots. Its your time to reserve a piece of the reserve.
Insights: 150 Rix Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Postcode Perfect, Near New & Amazing Value!
Low Care Offering Easy Comfortable Living
Parks Play Relax & Lifestyle
Great Home Design & Comfort
This perfectly positioned home offers great value with 3 bedrooms, the master with ensuite & walk in robe, bedroom 2 & 3 has built in robes, main bathroom offers maximum convenience.
Open plan living along with meals zone, connects the modern kitchen with stone bench top, ample storage, dishwasher, stainless trim appliances incl oven gas cooker & dishwasher.
Highlights-
Perfect presentation
Split System Air Conditioning
Ducted Gas Heating
Double remote garage, internal access.
Laminate Flooring to high traffic areas
Smart wiring Cat 6 data pts to bedrooms & living area
Quality fixtures and fittings
Landscaped gardens
Adjacent future parkland-reserve
Located 200m from a future proposed IGA Supermarket at the front of the estate
Direct fwy access interchange proposed only 1km away at Officer South Rd.
Super convenient location that captures modern living perfectly. Located close to shops & a vast array of private / public schools. Enjoy an array of cafes, eateries, specialty retailers and parks whilst the train station is located with an easy stroll for convenience.
With Officer / Beaconsfield train stations and the Monash Fwy at your fingertips, reserves and lifestyle living is the norm.
A great home, appealing balanced color scheme & finish, the option for the new owner to move in and make it home or allow the current tenants that are wonderful to stay on with a new lease and you enjoy the benefits of a ready made investment.
The current tenants come highly regarded and praised by the vendor and agent.
Opportunity is knocking!

Description:
Luxurious Home, A Cut Above the Rest.
This modern and stylish home fantastically situated in the Banksia Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for a vast array of buyers. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of four spacious bedrooms, a large open plan living zone, two bathrooms and a double car lock up garage. The moment you step foot through the inviting double doors, you are greeted by soaring ceilings and the over-sized master bedroom with walk in robes and ensuite featuring stone bench tops, floor to ceiling porcelain tiles and large double shower. Moving further through the home you will find the open plan dining and lounge area, all over-looked by the highly appointed kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, undermounted sink and walk in pantry. The further three bedrooms all in generous proportions have built in robes, accommodated by the main bathroom which features two separate basins and a freestanding bath tub. The home perfectly blends indoor and outdoor living, with sliding doors opening out to the alfresco decking area perfect for entertaining family and friends. A host of extra's include 3 metre ceilings in the main living area, high quality carpet and underlay, roller blinds throughout and curtains in the master bedroom, split system cooling and ducted heating, solar panels and sound insulation to the external walls. The location is second to none, being within close proximity to the Beaconsfield shopping precinct, the Beaconsfield Primary School, St Francis Xavier College, the Beaconsfield train station and bus stops. Contact Jack McMaster on 0468 958 463 for further information!

Description:
Modernly Magnificent
Situated in Melbourne's fastest growing corridor. This neat and tidy home is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. With schools, freeway access and parklands just a stone throw away, this home is positioned for the growing family.
Accommodation includes three generous bedrooms, the master with full ensuite and built in robe. The kitchen, exemplary. Featuring stone throughout, waterfall bench tops, undermounted sink and high-end appliances. Adjoining is a meals and family living area, flowing beautifully outside to a large decking area.
Creature comforts include gas ducted heating, split system air conditioner and double car garage. A home to suit either the first home buyer, investor or downsizer in one of Melbourne's premium suburbs.

Description:
SPACIOUS FAMILY LIVING IN ARENA
Built with quality and excellence we are proud to present you this impressive and spacious family home located in the heart of Officers' Arena Estate offering you a modern façade and landscaped gardens this residence will be an eye catcher.
Making an impression as soon you walk through the front door with high ceilings, open plan living and quality flooring flowing through the home. Offering you a well-designed floorplan tailored for the large family and providing you the ultimate space with multiple living zones for you to enjoy. In the heart of the home we present the modern kitchen with luxury appointments including 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, ample bench space and an abundance of cupboard storage.
Be awestruck by the generous sized master bedroom featuring the walk in robe and ensuite serviced by the double vanity and double shower. The additional three bedrooms fitted with built in robes and serviced by a kids retreat and main central bathroom plus a study located to the front of the home which has enough floor space to be converted to a 5th bedroom.
Entertain with your family and friends with the large timber glass doors opening into the undercover alrfresco area leading to the private low maintenance yard all situated on a 574sqm allotment.
Offering impressive extras such as remote control double garage with internal and rear access, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, split system air conditioner, pendant lighting, roller blinds and venetian blinds plus so much more.
The Arena Shopping precinct minutes away offers a choice of stores including Woolworths, bakery, chemist, medical centre and selection of eateries. Public transport only a short walk away with the option of the bus routes that operates throughout the estate or the Cardinia Train Station minutes away and only a stone's throw away from the M1 freeway and primary and high schools within walking distance.
Do not miss out on this beautiful home and contact Susan 0448 101 746 to organise a private inspection today!

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT
Presented in the Banksia Estate in Officer, this home provides a fantastic lifestyle for the lucky buyer. With a charming facade and inviting entrance, you will be instantly impressed.
On entry you are greeted with high ceilings and wide entrance hall. To the right you will find bedrooms two and three both including BIRS and are serviced by the modern bathroom with quality fixtures and fittings and spa bath.
Central to the home is the large main living with an abundance of natural light. The kitchen over looks this zone and features stainless steel appliances, pendant lights, WIP and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
Flowing effortlessly the floor plan has been well designed with private master bedroom located at the rear of the home and including large WIR and full ensuite. Entertaining is made easy with second living zone as well as undercover alfresco.
Outside has had the hard work taken away with full landscaping and immaculate gardens.
Added features include but are not limited to extra large two and half car garage, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, laundry, storage space and much more.
Located just minutes away from Officers new proposed town centre, Officer Train Station, Beaconsfield and Officer shops, prestigious schools, Park Central Estate Park and much more. Only on inspection will you truely be able to appreciate what this quality home has to offer.
Call Liza Hickey or Aman Singh today.

Ray White proudly introducing you this golden opportunity, this massive 800m2 of land in Grandvue estate. Giving one lucky buyer to secure their future majestic home or savvy investment, you don't want to miss out on this opportunity!

Situated close proximity to the M1 Freeway, Cardinia train station, Arena shopping centre, Lakeside park, St Francis Xavier College, St Clares Primary school, you will love the flexibility this location provides.

Description:
A Ripper in Grandvue Officer!!
Showcasing an open-plan design and a sleek, modern fit out, this home is functional and truly desirable!
Offering:
* Four bedrooms (master with full ensuite and WIR)
* Chef style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher
* Open-plan dining and family room
* Alfresco entertaining area
* Low maintenance backyard
* Split system and ducted heating
* Double garage with remote control
This convenient location makes this property a short walk to St Francis Xavier College, St Brigids Primary School and Arena Shopping Complex. This property makes commuting a breeze, with easy access to the M1 Freeway and only approximately 1.5kms to the Cardinia Road Train Station.
Perfectly appointed and presented, book your inspection today!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
IMMACULATE AFFORDABLE LUXURY
If youre looking for the best and nothing but the best, then this is it! This picture-perfect home located in the sought-after arcadia state is sure to meet your expectation. With a short drive to all amenities including the Train Station, Shopping Centre and easy access from Princess Highway.
Offering the comfort of 3 spacious bedrooms, master complimented with walk in robe and full ensuite and split system, secondary bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 bathrooms consisting of stone benches and porcelain tiles.
The kitchen is one of the many alluring aspects this home has to offer equipped with an island bench with a 40mm stone feature and pendant drop lights to complement its beauty, equipped with impressive 900mm cooktop, range hood and oven. Complete with a dishwasher, plumbing point to the fridge and stone splash back.
This magnificent home also comes with a huge laundry with overhead cupboards, stone splash back and sliding access door to the back yard. The undercover decking area is perfect for entertaining with family and friends.
Other remarkable upgrades included:
- LED downlights.
- Garage with internal access and remote control.
- 2x Split Systems for cooling
- Gas Ducted Heating
- Gas water heater
- Double blinds
- vinyl plank flooring
- Flyscreens
- Landscaping
- 2 Years Young Remaining 7 Year Construction Warranty
- 7 STAR Energy Rating
Call Khalil on 0421 711 125 or Shabana on 0411 216 186 to make a private viewing of this stunning family home.
